metadata.synopsis: An AD the captain says after she opens the barrier for the player.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to 1357; 0; -766 in CRE_Main_A and talk to the captain. Show her the artefact, and have her open the barrier for you. After the dialog ends, she will say the AD.

0.speaker: Kith'rak Therezzyn
0.text: The Inquisitor awaits. Follow the corridor.

1.speaker: Kith'rak Therezzyn
1.text: Go. Down the hall. The Inquisitor awaits.
